title: Lowest Net Bilateral Aid Flows from Belgium
description: In 2017, the Maldives received one of the lowest net bilateral aid flows from Belgium, amounting to -$200,000. This indicates a net outflow rather than an inflow of aid.

title: Minimal Exposure to PM2.5 Air Pollution
description: In 2015, only a negligible percentage of the Maldivian population was exposed to PM2.5 air pollution levels exceeding WHO guidelines, showcasing effective air quality management.

title: High CPIA Building Human Resources Rating
description: The Maldives achieved a high CPIA building human resources rating of 5 in 2023, reflecting strong efforts in developing human capital and resources.

title: Low Rate of Teenage Mothers
description: In 2017, only 1.6% of women aged 15-19 in the Maldives were teenage mothers, indicating effective reproductive health education and services.
